name: Alpha
name_helptext: This will be the visible displayed name on the map, be short and descriptive.
capture_time_helptext: How many seconds it will take to change the color of a capture point or disable a rally point.
has_buzzer_helptext: 0/1 if a buzzer is connected it will play 5 beeps when capture has completed.
spawn_buzzer_helptext: 0/1 enables or disables buzzer used for spawn announcements.
spawn_main_cycle_helptext: Specify the amount of minutes between each main spawn cycle, leading to a buzz being played by the spawn points when respawn is due.
spawn_rally_cycle_helptext: Specify the amount of minutes between each rally spawn cycle, leading to a buzz being played by the spawn points when respawn is due.
